remarks: Sum of three small pieces is less than ε (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem30.ibl $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. I |-> ( F x. -u G ) ) e. L^1 ) $.
fourierlemreimleblemlte22.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> F e. CC ) $.
fourierdlem30.g $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> G e. CC ) $.
fourierdlem30.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
fourierdlem30.x $e |- X = ( abs ` A ) $.
fourierdlem30.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
fourierdlem30.y $e |- Y = ( abs ` C ) $.
fourierdlem30.z $e |- Z = ( abs ` S. I ( F x. -u G ) _d x ) $.
fourierdlem30.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. RR+ ) $.
fourierdlem30.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem30.ler $e |- ( ph -> ( ( ( ( X + Y ) + Z ) / E ) + 1 ) <_ R ) $.
fourierdlem30.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
fourierdlem30.12 $e |- ( ph -> ( abs ` B ) <_ 1 ) $.
fourierdlem30.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
fourierdlem30.14 $e |- ( ph -> ( abs ` D ) <_ 1 ) $.
fourierdlem30 $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` ( ( ( A x. -u ( B / R ) ) - ( C x. -u ( D / R ) ) ) - S. I ( F x. -u ( G / R ) ) _d x ) ) < E ) $.
$d I x $.
$d R x $.
$d ph x $.
